subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: As a fumbled ball bounced through the end zone, K. J. Wright helped it on its way by batting it. The ruling, a touchback, was wrong, an N.F.L. executive said.
snippet: As a fumbled ball bounced through the end zone, K. J. Wright helped it on its way by batting it. The ruling, a touchback, was wrong, an N.F.L. executive said.
